backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the app store backend with types for apps, reviews, and categories, providing functions to add apps, search/filter apps by name/developer/category, retrieve apps, and submit reviews with automatic rating calculation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features (home page, search interface, category browsing, app detail pages, and review submission) with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and functionality, covering pages, components, hooks, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining CSS custom properties for light and dark mode color schemes using OKLCH color space with neutral grays and brand colors for UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Champ Playstore application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, category, and app detail pages, wrapped in a layout with navbar, footer, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AppCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying app icon, name, developer, and star rating with hover effects and navigation to the app detail page.
Section component rendering a horizontally scrollable list of up to 10 apps for a given category with category icon, title, and "See all" link.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters based on hostname.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Sticky navigation header with logo, search bar, category links for desktop, and responsive mobile menu using sheet drawer component.
frontend/src/components/ReviewForm.tsx: Form component for submitting app reviews with star rating input, comment textarea, and validation. Uses mutation hook to submit reviews and displays toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/components/ReviewsList.tsx: Displays a list of reviews in card format showing star rating, reviewer principal (truncated), timestamp, and optional comment. Shows empty state message when no reviews exist.
frontend/src/components/ScreenshotsGalle: Carousel component for displaying app screenshots with click-to-expand dialog functionality. Uses shadcn carousel and dialog components with responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: Search input with debounced queries for app name and developer search. Displays combined, deduplicated results in a dropdown with app icons, ratings, and categories.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: Read-only star rating display component supporting full, half, and empty stars with configurable sizes (sm/md/lg). Renders 5 stars based on numeric rating value.
Interactive star rating input with hover preview and click-to-select functionality. Allows users to select ratings from 1-5 stars with visual feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Automatically invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status. Handles AuthClient creation with configurable options and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching apps (all, by category, by ID) and searching (by name/developer). Includes mutation hook for adding reviews with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a vibrant app store color palette using OKLCH color space. Includes light/dark mode themes and brand color utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/AppDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single app including icon, name, developer, rating, screenshots gallery, description, reviews list, and a review submission form. Handles loading states with skeletons and shows error state if app is not found.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Shows all apps within a selected category in a grid layout with sorting options (popularity, rating, name). Includes loading skeletons and empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page featuring a hero banner, featured apps section, popular apps sorted by downloads, and category sections for browsing. Displays loading skeletons while data is fetching.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, brand colors, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing Champ Playstore as an app store application with features for browsing, searching, and discovering apps. Includes architectural notes, image requirements, and completed feature list.
